Name: Brandt Module
Description:
Manufacturer: Shubin Interstellar
Item Type: Mining Module (Active)

Instability: -75%
All Charge Rates: -25%
Heat Generation: +10%
Signature Size: +20%
Duration: 90 seconds
Uses: 5

Strategically use this module to crack unstable rocks. The Brandt provides 90 seconds of stabilized power to decrease a mining laser's charge rate while also reducing a deposit's instability.
